thread.title: BRIEF-Littelfuse Reports Q1 Adj Earnings Per Share $2.39

title: BRIEF-Littelfuse Reports Q1 Adj Earnings Per Share $2.39
text:
May 2, 2018 / 11:00 AM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Littelfuse Reports Q1 Adj Earnings Per Share $2.39 Reuters Staff
May 2 (Reuters) - Littelfuse Inc: * Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.39
* Q1 SALES $417.8 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $391.5 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.81 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.45
* LITTELFUSE - Q2 2018 NET SALES EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $450 MILLION TO $462 MILLION
* LITTELFUSE - Q2 2018 ADJUSTED DILUTED EPS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $2.39 TO $2.53 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
